description:
CMAP not only has incredible knowledge and unbeatable talent, but one of their members even has the Arms of Flame, which burn even hotter than Kazuma’s Hands of the Sun! Will Kazuma’s love of good food and good friends be enough?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai [Love] wa Saito mo Sukuu!! Taiyou no Te VS Honoo no Ude!
L`amour fleurit à Saito ! Mains solaires contre bras ardents !
Love Will Save Even Saito! Hands of the Sun vs. Arms of Flame!
ความรักช่วยกอบกู้ไซโตะ!! หัตถ์ตะวัน V.S แขนอัคคี
愛[ラブ]は西都も救う!! 太陽の手VS炎の腕!
